meanings.definition: A yellow crystalline compound found in certain plants.
meanings.sent1: The xanthone extracted from the plant was a vibrant yellow color.
meanings.sent2: Scientists discovered a new type of xanthone in the rare flower.
meanings.sent3: The bees buzzed happily around the xanthone-filled petals.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as bright as a xanthone in the sunlight.
meanings.sent5: The xanthone sparkled like a tiny golden gem in the laboratory.

meanings.definition: Any of various derivatives of xanthone.
meanings.sent1: The pharmaceutical company developed a new xanthone derivative for their medicine.
meanings.sent2: There are many different types of xanthone derivatives used in the cosmetic industry.
meanings.sent3: The chef added a pinch of xanthone derivative to the recipe for a unique flavor.
meanings.sent4: Her artwork was a beautiful blend of colors, including a hint of xanthone derivative.
meanings.sent5: The garden bloomed with flowers of every hue, including those with xanthone derivatives.
